document_data.name: Frost Witches
document_data.mainbody: The '''Frost Witches''' were a group of female [[wizard]]s who followed [[Auril]], the Frostmaiden.
document_data.Activities: The group recorded [[tome]]s of frost [[magic]]. They were rumored to know the location of the ''[[Codicil of White]]'', an ancient tome detailing Aurilian rituals and containing [[spell]]s related to frost magic.
